sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './Widget.css' import { useState } from 'react'; export default function Widget({datetime,daysummary,alt,celciusAsUnit}) { return (

{daysummary.description}

{datetime}

Maximum day temperature: {celciusAsUnit ? daysummary.maxtemp_c+"gre" : daysummary.maxtemp_f}

Average day temperature {celciusAsUnit ? daysummary.avgtemp_c : daysummary.avgtemp_f}

Minimum day temperature: {celciusAsUnit ? daysummary.mintemp_c : daysummary.mintemp_c}

) }
